actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate medicare taxes as the method for financing the hospital insurance program, and to provide that such program shall instead be financed from general revenues.

summary.text: Eliminates, under the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code for 1954, medicare taxes as the method for financing the hospital insurance program. Provides that such program shall instead be financed from general revenues.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate medicare taxes as the method for financing the hospital insurance program, and to provide that such program shall instead be financed from general revenues.
